h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is at the Windrest Hamlet in Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge. This can be accessed from the Valley of Despair Shrine in Sandgate Village.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 9'.
The content is as follows:
The next Mind Core is at the Windrest Hamlet in Yellow Sand Formation in Yellow Wind Ridge. This can be accessed from the Valley of Despair Shrine in Sandgate Village.
